attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following her successful crusade to give Ghurkha's the right to settle in the UK, its about time this lovely lady was made a Dame.

Personally I think she deserved it for playing Patsy in Ab Fab, but her recent dedication and passion exhibited towards the Ghurka's edges it.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
